name: Silex
author: Alex Hoyau aka lexoyo
keywords: free website builder with source code

scripts.build: npm run build:css; npm run build:html; npm run build:js;
scripts.build:html: node_modules/.bin/jade src/html/*.jade --out dist/client/ --no-debug; mv dist/client/release.html dist/client/index.html
scripts.build:js: java -jar node_modules/superstartup-closure-compiler/build/es6compiler.jar --js submodules/closure-library/closure/goog/ --js src/js/ --externs src/externs.js --js_output_file dist/client/js/admin.min.js --compilation_level ADVANCED_OPTIMIZATIONS --language_in ECMASCRIPT6_STRICT --language_out ECMASCRIPT3 --create_source_map dist/client/js/admin.min.js.map --closure_entry_point silex.App --only_closure_dependencies --manage_closure_dependencies --define="goog.DEBUG=false"; echo "//# sourceMappingURL=/js/admin.min.js.map" >> dist/client/js/admin.min.js;
scripts.watch:css: npm run livereload:start; node_modules/watch/cli.js 'npm run build:css; npm run livereload:changed' src/css/
scripts.watch:html: npm run livereload:start; node_modules/watch/cli.js 'npm run build:html; npm run livereload:changed' src/html/
scripts.watch:js: npm run livereload:start; node_modules/watch/cli.js 'npm run build:js; npm run livereload:changed' src/js/
